attributes.name: Tiger Conservation Landscapes and Corridors
attributes.description: These three layers show the location of tiger conservation landscapes, Tx2 tiger conservation landscapes, and Terai Arc landscape corridors.

options.cartocss: #tiger_conservation_landscapes {  polygon-fill: #FFCC00;  polygon-opacity: 0.8;  line-color: #FF5C00;  line-width: 0.5;  line-opacity: 0.5;}#tiger_conservation_landscapes[tx2_tcl=1] {  polygon-fill: #FF5C00;  line-color: #081B47;}

attributes.name: 2005 Coral Reef Locations
attributes.description: A record of global coral reef locations in 2005.

attributes.name: 2000 Anthropogenic Biomes
attributes.description: Historical transformations within the terrestrial biosphere caused by sustained direct human interaction with ecosystems from 1700-2000. The map displays the year 2000.

options.cartocss: #layer { raster-opacity:1; raster-scaling:near; raster-colorizer-default-mode:discrete; raster-colorizer-default-color:  transparent; raster-colorizer-epsilon:0.41; raster-colorizer-stops: stop(11, #A80000) stop(12, #A80000) stop(21, #00C0FF) stop(22, #00C0FF) stop(23, #00C0FF) stop(24, #00C0FF) stop(25, #00C0FF) stop(26, #00C0FF) stop(31, #FFFF73) stop(32, #FFFF73) stop(33, #FFFF73) stop(34, #FFFF73) stop(35, #FFFF73) stop(41, #E69800) stop(42, #E69800) stop(43, #E69800) stop(51, #9ED7C2) stop(52, #9ED7C2) stop(61, #EBFFEB) stop(62, #EBFFEB) stop(63, #EBFFEB)}

options.sql: SELECT * FROM vnp14imgtdl_nrt_global_7d where (acq_date> (CURRENT_DATE - interval '7 day')) and frp>=100 ORDER BY frp asc
options.cartocss: #layer { ::halo { marker-width: 20; marker-fill: #FFCC00; marker-fill-opacity: 1; marker-line-color: #f0fcaa; marker-line-width: 0; marker-line-opacity: 1; marker-placement: point; marker-type: ellipse; marker-allow-overlap: true; opacity: 0.3;} marker-width: 5; marker-fill: #ffcc00; marker-fill-opacity: 1; marker-line-color: #FFF; marker-line-width: 0; marker-line-opacity: 1; marker-placement: point; marker-type: ellipse; marker-allow-overlap: true; }

pulseConfig.sql: SELECT ST_Transform(the_geom_webmercator, 32663) as the_geom_webmercator, bright_ti4, scan, track, acq_date, acq_time, satellite, confidence, version, bright_ti5, frp, daynight FROM vnp14imgtdl_nrt_global_7d WHERE (acq_date> (CURRENT_DATE - interval '7 day')) and frp>=100

pulseConfig.url: https://api.resourcewatch.org/v1/query/20cc5eca-8c63-4c41-8e8e-134dcf1e6d76?sql=SELECT  bright_ti4, scan, track, acq_date, acq_time, satellite, confidence, version, bright_ti5, frp, daynight FROM vnp14imgtdl_nrt_global_7d WHERE (acq_date> (CURRENT_DATE - interval '7 day')) and frp>=100 and st_intersects(the_geom,st_buffer(ST_SetSRID(st_geomfromgeojson('{"type":"Point","coordinates":{{point}}}'),4326),1))

config.url: https://api.resourcewatch.org/v1/query/20cc5eca-8c63-4c41-8e8e-134dcf1e6d76?sql=SELECT ST_Transform(the_geom_webmercator, 32663) as the_geom_webmercator, bright_ti4, scan, track, acq_date, acq_time, satellite, confidence, version, bright_ti5, frp, daynight FROM  vnp14imgtdl_nrt_global_7d WHERE (acq_date> (CURRENT_DATE - interval '7 day')) and frp>=100 and st_intersects(the_geom,st_buffer(ST_SetSRID(st_geomfromgeojson('{"type":"Point","coordinates":{{point}}}'),4326),1)) order by acq_date desc limit 1

attributes.name: 2005 USGS Mineral Maps
attributes.description: Major mineral commodity deposits identified by the USGS throughout the world in 2005.

options.cartocss: #mrds_trim{  marker-fill-opacity: 1;  marker-line-color: #FFFFFF;  marker-line-width: 0.5;  marker-line-opacity: 0.7;  marker-placement: point;  marker-type: ellipse;  marker-width: 5;  marker-fill: #3bb2d0;  marker-allow-overlap: true;}

attributes.name: Water Institutions
attributes.description: The main institutions dealing with water resources for agriculture and rural development in 117 countries.

options.sql: SELECT the_geom, the_geom_webmercator, type FROM fao_aquastat_water_institutions
options.cartocss: #fao_aquastat_water_institutions {   marker-fill-opacity: 1;   marker-line-color: #FFF;   marker-line-width: 0.5;   marker-line-opacity: 0.7;   marker-placement: point;   marker-type: ellipse;   marker-width: 5;   marker-allow-overlap: true;}#fao_aquastat_water_institutions[type='Government institution'] {   marker-fill: #d53e4f;}#fao_aquastat_water_institutions[type='International agency'] {   marker-fill: #f46d43;}#fao_aquastat_water_institutions[type='Non-governmental organization'] {   marker-fill: #fdae61;}#fao_aquastat_water_institutions[type='Private sector'] {   marker-fill: #fee08b;}#fao_aquastat_water_institutions[type='Regional Development Organisations'] {   marker-fill: #e6f598;}#fao_aquastat_water_institutions[type='Regional agency'] {   marker-fill: #abdda4;}#fao_aquastat_water_institutions[type='River basin organization'] {   marker-fill: #66c2a5;}#fao_aquastat_water_institutions[type='University/Research institution'] {   marker-fill: #3288bd;}

attributes.name: Tropical and Temperate Rainfall Dataset, Climate Hazard InfraRed Precipitation with Stations: CHIRPS

options.cartocss: #chirps_2 {raster-opacity:1; raster-scaling:near; raster-colorizer-default-mode: linear; raster-colorizer-default-color:  transparent; raster-colorizer-epsilon:0.11; raster-colorizer-stops: stop(1, #ff4d4d) stop(140, #FEB24C) stop(200, #fff2cc) stop(220, #C7E9B4) stop(240, #0080ff)}

attributes.name: Coral Reef Watch Bleaching Hotspots
attributes.description: The maximum level of coral bleaching stress an ocean grid cell has been exposed to in the last week due to prolonged high sea surface temperature (SST). The scale ranges from 0, Bleaching Watch, to 8, Mortality Likely.

options.cartocss: #coralreefhotspots {raster-opacity:1; raster-scaling:near; raster-colorizer-default-mode: linear; raster-colorizer-default-color:  transparent; raster-colorizer-epsilon:0.11; raster-colorizer-stops: stop(1, #32AFFF) stop(2, #28CDF4) stop(3, #1FE9E8) stop(4, #16DFB6) stop(5, #0ED485) stop(7, #06C955) stop(9, #00BF27)}
